songs.title: Southern Smoke
songs.lyrics:
[B.o.B]
I’ma say this once, and one time only. If you’re looking for that smoke, I mean that, that real, real Southern Smoke, there’s only one place you know where to get it from: www.djsmallz.com. Smallz got that real good smoke nigga, that Southern Smoke for y’all bitches, that shit that make you go (cough). But nigga, y’all niggas can’t burn it down like DJ Smallz, nigga, put one in the air for Cloud 9. Y’already know. So if you been buyin’ that whack shit from them other niggas that been sellin’ you, tryna imitate that smoke, nigga you trippin’. Come to, come over here to the real, come over here to the real side, where the real niggas smoke at, nigga shit
